name: The Puppeteer (Annika Emmel, Reneah)
description:
In "The Puppeteer" you take over the role of an unknown puppeteer and control your own helpless puppet to give you audience the best show you can.

Prepare yourself to encounter bugs and incomplete game play, but be sure to have fun!

This game was developed for the GMTK Jam 2021 in 48 hours by  a two person team. The topic was 'Joined together'.

Art by Annika Emmel

Programming & Animation by Franziska Schümann

Music:

Industrial Music Box Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
